test-method.name: testValidLogin
test-method.description: Validate logging into the application using valid credentials

test-method.name: testValidLoginWithLastRowData
test-method.description: Validate logging into the application using valid credentials from last Excel row

test-method.name: testInvalidEmailAndPassword
test-method.description: Validate logging into the application using invalid credentials

test-method.name: testInvalidEmailValidPassword
test-method.description: Validate login with invalid email address and valid password

test-method.name: testValidEmailInvalidPassword
test-method.description: Validate login with valid email address and invalid password

test-method.name: testEmptyCredentials
test-method.description: Validate login without entering any credentials

test-method.name: testForgottenPasswordLink
test-method.description: Validate the Forgotten Password link functionality

test-method.name: testKeyboardNavigationLogin
test-method.description: Validate login using keyboard navigation

test-method.name: testPlaceholderTexts
test-method.description: Validate placeholder texts in login form fields
